column5: This is a great 4 bedroom 2 bathroom home located on the La Paloma Course at Tascosa Country Club. The upstairs balcony overlooks the number 1 hole on Tascosa.  This smart-home screams luxury at every turn, from its gourmet kitchen to its spa-like bathrooms. The first floor has beautiful hand scraped bamboo floors and imported Brazilian tile. Upstairs features renewable cork flooring which is great at reducing noise and feels great on the feet. Fully furnished with everything you will need.
column8: Luxury Golf Course Retreat - Sleeps up to 12
